name: Lost In Shadow
description:
Lost In Shadow mixes unique platform elements to challenge the player.
Alter shapes of surrounding objects’ shadows, create walkways to
previously inaccessible areas, and adventure into a world never before
seen on Wii.

There is a Tower that rises above all in an alternate world. No one
knows who built this or why it was built. One thing is certain, the
Tower both sheds a large shadow and at the same time is filled with
moving shadows.
